Comments_List: I gained an appreciation and understanding of ethnography and anthropology.

I enjoyed the seminar style, for it gave me freedom o listen, think, process and respond to my classmates. This was definitely my most intellectually stimulating class this semester and Im so glad I ended up taking it.  Im excited to take the work I did with my final paper and apply it to future academic work.
This course is the quintessential seminar. I appreciated it.
Strength is definitely the discussion and discussant and respondent style. It could be improved by more feedback on writing throughout the semester.
YES! Great professor and such a thought provoking space. You will really grow in your intellectual engagement with the texts and in discussion with classmates.
